XXbsa070_u:10: / vādakārakāṇāñcāntaraṃ vastuto mṛdvapi paraṃ bahirbahudoṣaṃ dṛśyate /
XXbsa070_u:13: maivaṃ, naiṣa vādaprārambhaḥ paribhavalābhakhyātyartho 'pi tu sulakṣaṇadurlakṣaṇopadeśecchayaiva vādasya prārambhaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:14: yadīha loke vādo na bhavet, mugdhānāṃ bāhulyaṃ syāt /
XXbsa070_u:16: vādāvagame tu svayaṃ sulakṣadurlakṣaṇaśūnyalakṣaṇaparijñānatvāt sarve mārāstīrthikā mithyādṛṣṭimanuṣyāśca viheṭhanāsamarthā ( Uh 4.)
XXbsa070_u:18: tasmātsattvahitecchayeha loke saddharmasya pracārecchayā ca mayaiṣa samyagvāda ārabhyate /
XXbsa070_u:21: vādārambho 'pi tathaivādhunā saddharmmarakṣaṇecchayā na tu khyātilābhāya /
XXbsa070_u:26: yaduktaṃ pūrvaṃ bhavatā yadyetaṃ vādaṃ jānīyādvādadharmānavagacchediti vaktavyametasya lakṣaṇam
XXbsa070_u:30: paravādāvagamaḥ, yathā dhānyamuptvā siktā codakena tasya puṣṭiḥ
XXbsa070_u:35: yadi kaścidetamaṣṭavidhamarthaṃ parijānīyānniyatameva sarvavādadharmāvagame samartho bhavet
XXbsa070_u:39: atha tīrthikānāṃ vādadharmāḥ santi na vā /
XXbsa070_u:42: dravyaṃ guṇaḥ sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaḥ karma samavāyaścetyādikavādadharmeṣu svavagateṣvapi parasūtraśāstrāṇāmapratītiḥ
XXbsa070_u:45: ( Uh 5.) dṛṣṭāntaḥ siddhānto vākyapraśaṃsā vākyadoṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ prāptakālavākyaṃ hetvābhāso vākchalam /
XXbsa070_u:56: hetvābhāso yathā marīcābudakābhāsaḥ, na tu vastuta
XXbsa070_u:58: yadi vādī svalaṅkṛtairvākyairudakamiti vadettadā sa hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:61: vastraṃ na kālaḥ kathaṃ nava ityucyate /
XXbsa070_u:70: dṛṣṭāntavacanaṃ hi yatra pṛthagjanānāmāryāṇāñca buddhisāmyaṃ tadā vaktavyam /
XXbsa070_u:97: sarvasamaḥ sarvabhinna ādau samaḥ paścādbhinna ādau bhinnaḥ paścātsamaśca /
XXbsa070_u:104: sarvasamo yathā, (vādī vadeda)ātmātmīyañca na vidyete, prativadyapi vadedātmātmīyañca na vidyeta ityayaṃ sarvasamaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:106: vadet) pṛthagiti prativādī tu vadedekamityayam sarvabhinnaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:107: ādau samaḥ paścādbhinno yathā, (vādī vadet) sarvaṃ dṛṣṭadharmaṃ sat /
XXbsa070_u:113: yadi punarupamānenātmā sanniti, atha sādharmyapūrvakamupamānamityātmā kenopamīyate /
XXbsa070_u:116: kutracitsanniti kutracidasanniti kathaṃ tatpratītirityayamādau samaḥ paścādbhinnaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:117: ādau bhinnaḥ ( Uh 7.) paścātsamo yathā, (vādī vadeda)ātmātmīyañca na vidyete /
XXbsa070_u:121: api cāparimitāni lakṣaṇāni siddhāntasya, tadyathā dvādaśa nidānāni,
XXbsa070_u:122: duḥkhaṃ, samudayaḥ, nirodhaḥ, mārgaḥ saptatriṃśatpakṣāḥ, catvāri śrāmaṇyaphalānītyādayo dharmā buddhasya samyagarthā ityucyante /
XXbsa070_u:123: sandhyāpūjā, balidānaṃ, dhūpadīpanaṃ, tailadīpanivedanamiti caturvidhā yājñikatīrthikānāṃ kriyā /
XXbsa070_u:124: triṣaṣṭyakṣarāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ ca padānāmartha iti śābdikāstīrthikāḥ /
XXbsa070_u:133: aṣṭaiśvaryāṇi [tadyathā] aṇimā, mahimā, laghimā, prāptiḥ, prākāmyaṃ,
XXbsa070_u:136: jīvo 'jīvaḥ pāpaṃ puṇyamāśravaḥ, nirjarā, sambaraḥ, bandhaḥ, mokṣaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:144: apare 'pi santi ye vadanti sarvamekaṃ sadbhāvājjñeyam /
XXbsa070_u:145: sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca guṇavattvādaikyam, kiñca pradhānāt samutpannaṃ sarvamekaṃ jñeyamekamūlatvā ityevamekavādinastīrthikāḥ /
XXbsa070_u:164: api ca yathā kecidvadanti nirvāṇabhāvaḥ na duḥkhaṃ na ca sukham /
XXbsa070_u:166: sarve hi dharmāścetanāḥ saduḥkhasukhā nirvāṇaṃ tvacetanaṃ kathaṃ sukhaṃ syāt /
XXbsa070_u:173: api ca nirvāṇaṃ nityamiti mayā pūrvaṃ jñātam /
XXbsa070_u:177: nirvāṇaṃ nityamiti pūrvaṃ jñātaṃ kimucyate saṃksāraistattulyam /
XXbsa070_u:182: ātmabhāvasya rūpavattve nityo 'nityo vāyamiti na niścīyate /
XXbsa070_u:184: sarvaṃ mūrtamanityameva yathā murto ghaṭo vināśī /
XXbsa070_u:188: yathā ratnabudhyā sikatopalādānaṃ tathā bhavato vacanamatīva mithyā /
XXbsa070_u:189: atha kasmādātmāmurta iti cenmayā pūrvamuktaṃ ghaṭo mūrtatvādvināśīti /
XXbsa070_u:190: yadyātmaivaṃ syāt, tadā so 'pi vināśī bhavet /
XXbsa070_u:201: atha kiṃ kevala evātmānāgate 'dhvani sukhaduḥkhe vedayate saśarīro vā /
XXbsa070_u:205: nanu ka eṣa ātmā yo 'nāgate 'dhvani sukhaduḥkhe vedayate /
XXbsa070_u:208: kathaṃ punaḥ sannasan vātmā' iti pṛcchyate /
XXbsa070_u:218: na hi sarve saṃskārā vijñānamiti tadayuktam /
XXbsa070_u:221: atha sarve dharmāṃ anityāḥ śabdastu naiva sarvaṃ, tasmācchabdo nitya iti /
XXbsa070_u:223: bhavatā sarvamityuktam, ko 'rthaḥ punaḥ śabdasya, yo naiva sarvam /
XXbsa070_u:271: kathaṃ nitya iti yacca samānadharmakaṃ tatsarvamanityam /
XXbsa070_u:276: yadi mūrkhāya gambhīrārtha vadedyathā sarve dharmā śūnyāḥ śāntā nirātmāno niṣpugdalā māyāvat nirmāṇavattattvarahitā ityādi tadā taṃ gambhīrārthaṃ vidvāneva jñātuṃ śankoti pṛthagjanastu śrutvā bhrāntyāpanno bhavet /
XXbsa070_u:280: asti dharmāṇāṃ karma, asti viṣākro 'sti ca bandhamokṣaḍiḥ /
XXbsa070_u:283: yadabhidhīyate tadyadi sattvopayogi bhavet, tadā sarveṣāṃ [tatra] pratītiranumodanañca /
XXbsa070_u:289: yathā kaścidvadet sarve dharmāḥ śūnyā anīśvarāḥ sarvavastūnāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāditi pratipattiḥ
XXbsa070_u:298: yathā kauśika ityuktvā punarvadeddevendraḥ śakraḥ purandaro veti /
XXbsa070_u:303: yadalaṅkṛtamasaṅgaṃ voktaṃ sa sarvo vākyadoṣa ityucyate /
XXbsa070_u:306: yathā kaściddevānāmindrasya śakrasya bhāryāṃ praśaṃmayan suvarṇarūpiṇīm //
XXbsa070_u:308: komalapādahastāṃ paścācca śakro devānāmindro 'suratripuravināśīti tu vadannityakramaṃ vacanamuktam
XXbsa070_u:313: kutaḥ punaḥ pratyakṣaṃ śreṣṭhamiti cedapareṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ pramāṇānāṃ pratyakṣopajīvakatvācchreṣṭham
XXbsa070_u:327: yathā rātrau sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā manuṣya eṣa ityucyate /
XXbsa070_u:334: anumānaṃ trividhaṃ pūrvavat, śeṣavat, sāmānyato [dṛṣṭaṃ] ca /
XXbsa070_u:335: yathā ṣaḍaṅguliṃ sapiḍakamūrdhānaṃ bālaṃ dṛṣṭvā paṣcāddhṛddhaṃ bahuśrutaṃ devadattaṃ dṛṣṭvā ṣaḍaṅgulismaraṇāt so 'yamiti pūrvavat /
XXbsa070_u:336: śeṣavat yathā, sāgarasalilaṃ pītvā tallavaṇarasamanubhūya ( Uh 14.)
XXbsa070_u:348: yathā suvaidyako bheṣajakuśalo maitracittena śikṣakaḥ suśruta ityucyate /
XXbsa070_u:352: yathā sarve dharmā śūnyāḥ śāntā māyāvat nirmāṇavat /
XXbsa070_u:353: saṃjñādāntāśvavat, saṃskārāḥ kadalīvat, kāmalakṣaṇaṃ piḍakavat viṣavat /
XXbsa070_u:359: hetvābhāsā eteṣu vādadharmesu mahādoṣā eva jñeyāḥ /
XXbsa070_u:369: / navaḥ, nava, na vaḥ, nava iti /
XXbsa070_u:374: yadbhavatā parihitaṃ tadekameva vastraṃ kathaṃ naveti /
XXbsa070_u:375: atra prativedenmayā nava ityuktaṃ tathāca navaḥ kambalaḥ natu naveti /
XXbsa070_u:376: atra dūṣayetkathaṃ nava? navalomairnirmitatvānnava ityukte prativādī vadet tattvato 'parimitāni lomāni kathaṃ navalomānītyucyate /
XXbsa070_u:378: nava iti mayā pūrvamuktaṃ na tu navasaṃkhyā /
XXbsa070_u:380: tadvastraṃ yuṣmākameveti jñātaṃ kasmādetanna vaḥ kathyate /
XXbsa070_u:382: mayā nava ityuktaṃ kintu na va iti noktam /
XXbsa070_u:384: bhavataḥ kāyaṃ kambalo vasta iti pratyakṣametat /
XXbsa070_u:394: saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ śrūnyāḥ śāntā ākāśavadityukte, dūṣaṇam /
XXbsa070_u:396: śūnyatvamabhāvaśca, tadā niḥsvabhāvā dharmā ākāśatulyā iti sāmānyachalam /
XXbsa070_u:401: yadi mṛdo ghaṭatvavattvaṃ tadā mṛdeva ghaṭaḥ syāt /
XXbsa070_u:403: yadi mṛdaḥ sadbhāvena ghaṭotpādakatvaṃ, tadodakasyāpi sadbhāvena ghaṭotpādakatvaṃ ( Uh 16.) syāt /
XXbsa070_u:404: yadyudakasya sadbhāvena ghaṭānutpādakatvaṃ kathaṃ tarhi mṛdo ghaṭotpādakatvam /
XXbsa070_u:409: rātrau taṃ dṛṣṭvā, eṣa sthāṇuḥ puruṣo veti vimarśaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:416: idānīṃ bhavatā śabdasya nityatākāraṇamapratiṣṭhāpya kathaṃ vedo nitya ityucyate /
XXbsa070_u:420: yathā gṛhe dagdha udākānveṣaṇaṃ bhavatopyevamiti kālātītaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:421: atha ko nāma prakaraṇasamaḥ? (ātmanaḥ) śarīra bhinnatvādātmā nityaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:430: 'pi nityaḥ syāt śarīrabhinnatve 'pi ghaṭo 'nitya iti cet, tarhyātmāpi śarīrabhinnatvāt kathaṃ nityaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:450: yuktiviruddho yathā, brāhmaṇasya kṣatrakarmānupālanaṃ mṛgayādiśikṣā ca,
XXbsa070_u:478: pṛthivyādi sarvavastusādhanasamarthaṃ sat, kathaṃ śarīramātraṃ sādhayediti nātra vivādaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:489: atha ghaṭo mūrta ityanityaḥ śabdasya tvamūrtatvāt kathaṃ tadṛṣṭāntalābhaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:503: yatha saṃjñā saṃyojanocchedikā, ityukte kaścit pṛcchet /
XXbsa070_u:505: jñānasya saṃjñāta utpādaṃ pūrvamanutkā saṃjñāmātrakathanādvākyavaiparītyamitīdaṃ dūṣaṇīyam
XXbsa070_u:517: eṣo 'rthaḥ mithyaiva, kiṃ bhavānnopalabhate tadā nigrahasthānam /
XXbsa070_u:523: etāni nigrahasthānāni vādasya mahākaṇṭakāni gambhīraduḥkhāni jñeyāni, drutañca heyāni /
XXbsa070_u:532: yadi vadedahamevamprakārān trīn praśnānnāvagacchāmi mama yathājñānamanyonyaṃ praṣṭavyaṃ, tadādoṣaḥ
XXbsa070_u:544: adhikam nirarthakaṃ, aprāptakālaṃ, punaruktaṃ pratijñāsannyāsa ityādīni
XXbsa070_u:557: atha dīpaścakṣuṣā dṛṣṭaḥ syāt, śabdaśca śravaṇena śrūyata iti kathaṃ dṛṣṭāntopapattiḥ /
XXbsa070_u:573: nanūcyate 'haṃ virodhīti cedbhavāṃstu mama vacanaṃ pratikūlayan katham
XXbsa070_u:576: yadvi viruddhamityucyate mayā, sā bhavata eva
XXbsa070_u:587: yadi kaścidvadedasti sattvo yāvatsanti prāṇā asti jīva ityādi /
XXbsa070_u:593: yathārhattvaphalaṃ kasmiṃścideva kāle vidyamānamapi pūrvaṃ paścāccāvidyamānatvādabhāva iti jñāyate /
XXbsa070_u:594: yathā ca dvītīyo mūrdhā tṛtīyo hastaśca /
XXbsa070_u:608: yadbhavatoktaṃ [yathā] dvitīyasya mūrdhnastṛtīyasya hastasya cādṛśyatvāda[bhāvaḥ] arhattva[phalasyāpya]bhāvaḥ iti spaṣṭam /
XXbsa070_u:610: dvitīyasya mūrdhno nāstitve 'pi tarhi na prathamasya
XXbsa070_u:617: yadyapi binduparimāṇaṃ na jñāyate tathāpyastyeva sāgaraḥ /
XXbsa070_u:621: yadi na śakyate vaktaṃ tadā bhavata evārthahāniḥ /
XXbsa070_u:624: yathā rātrau taruṃ dṛṣṭvā citte saṃśayaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:626: na khalū taruḥ sthāṇoḥ puruṣasya vo[palabdhau] niyato hetuḥ /
XXbsa070_u:627: anupalabdhireva nirvāṇasyābhāve niyato heturiti cennātra saṃśayasambhavaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:638: kiñca yadi vipākasya vināśaheturvartata iti cennocyate /
XXbsa070_u:644: yadi sāgarodakasadbhāvānnirvāṇasadbhāvaḥ siddhastadā kiṃ dvitīyasyāpi mūrdhnaḥ sadbhāvo na sidhyati /
XXbsa070_u:645: dvitīyasyāpi mūrdhnaḥ sadbhāvo na siddha iti cet ( Uh 24.) kathaṃ nirvāṇasya sadbhāvaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:646: tasmādbhavatoktaḥ sāgarodakadṛṣṭāntaḥ nirvāṇasadbhāvaṃ sādhayituṃ na samarthaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:654: yadyasato nirvāṇasya sattā tadā svato 'sato 'sattvamapi saditi cet, kathaṃ na nirvāṇasadbhāvalāba ityatra heturvaktavyaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:668: iyaṃ doṣāpattirna mamaivāpi tu sarveṣāmeva vādināṃ yathā śabdo nityo 'mūrtatvāt /
XXbsa070_u:673: bhavatāṃ tūdāhṛto dṛṣṭānto mama saṃśayamutpādayati tasmādasiyo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:677: yatpunarbhavatoktaṃ sarveṣāmeva doṣāpattirna tu mamaivetyeṣa ( Uh 25.)
XXbsa070_u:680: yathā kaścidabhiyukta ātmānamaprakāśya sarva eva taskarā iti vadettadāsau puruṣa ātmānamapi taskaraṃ manyata iti jñeyam /
XXbsa070_u:682: idānīṃ yadi bhavānātmānaṃ prakāśayitumiḥcchu pūrvayuktimatikramya punarvaktumicchennūnaṃ bahudoṣāpattiḥ syāt /
XXbsa070_u:685: pañcamena doṣāvadhimicchan pūrvaṃ nātikrāmedataḥ bhavato 'ntyaḥ pakṣaḥ punaruktaṃ bhavet
XXbsa070_u:697: ato 'yaṃ svayame sadoṣaḥ kathaṃ taṃ dūṣayet /
XXbsa070_u:706: yadi kaścittena viṃśatividhenārthena samyagnyāyamārabhate sa sadvādasya jñātetyucyate /
XXbsa070_u:713: yathā kleśakṣayo nirābhāsa eva, ākāśabhāvo 'pi nirābhāsa iti sādharmyam /
XXbsa070_u:715: yathā nirvāṇamakṛtakatvānnityaṃ tathā sarve saṃskārāḥ kṛtakatvādanityāḥ /
XXbsa070_u:721: śabdastu śravaṇena śruta iti, kathaṃ tayoḥ sādharmyam /
XXbsa070_u:722: yadi rūpādbhinnaḥ śabdastadā rūpasyānityatvācchabdo nityo bhavet /
XXbsa070_u:732: evaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ viṃśatividhaṃ yathā 1 utkarṣa[sama]m, 2 apakarṣa[sama]m, 3
XXbsa070_u:758: dūṣaṇaṃ] ātmā ākāśaścābhinnau iti cedaikadharmyāt kathamākāśasyātmano dṛṣṭāntatā /
XXbsa070_u:780: ākāśa ātmā ca pañcamahābhūtamayau kathaṃ nityāvuktau /
XXbsa070_u:812: na tvātmā sarvaṃ, tato nitya iti
XXbsa070_u:813: bhavatpratijñā ātmā ca tadbhāvādanitya iti vaktavyaḥ, kiñciddagdho hi kambalaḥ prāyeṇādagdhatvādadagdha ityucyate /
XXbsa070_u:829: yadi kāraṇaṃ na vidyata ātmārthasya hāniḥ /
XXbsa070_u:845: yadi bhavatā ekameva sūtramadhigacchatātmā nitya iti manyate
XXbsa070_u:857: yadi kiṃcitsadeva na tadānaindriyakatvaṃ hetutvena prayoktavyam /
XXbsa070_u:858: yadi ca sadeva tadā nānaindriyakatvena tasya sattā sādhyā /
XXbsa070_u:867: bhavatā tu ( Uh 31.) tatsadbhāvasya vikalpānmayā bhavato dūṣaṇaṃ kṛtam /
XXbsa070_u:872: / idānīntu svayaṃ bhavatā mama siddhāntaḥ prayuktaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:873: nanu kathaṃ bhavatā jñātaṃ yanmayā bhavadarthaḥ parigṛhītaḥ /
XXbsa070_u:874: atra kāraṇaṃ vaktavyamiti cenmayā khalu pūrvamuktaṃ yatsvārthamaparigṛṇhatā bhavatā parasthāpanā parigṛhītā kathamidānīṃ punaridaṃ pṛcchyate /
XXbsa070_u:875: kathaṃ jñātaṃ yadbhavato 'rtho maya parigṛhīta iti /
XXbsa070_u:878: anaindriyakatvātsannevātmeti bhavatā pūrvaṃ pratijñātaṃ paścāttu dharmabāhulyena sādhitam
XXbsa070_u:885: yadi vidvān gambhīraṃ nyāyaṃ bhāvayatyuktena dṛṣṭāntenārthāvagamasamarthaśca syāttadā tasya vāda evaṃvidhaṃ dharmaṃ nātikrāmati /
XXbsa070_u:890: yathā bīje sukṣetra upte mūlāṅkurāḥ samṛddhāḥ /
XXbsa070_u:896: tasmādye ye sañjñānotpattiṃ subhāśubhavivekañcecchanti taistaireva saddharmavāda āśrayitavyaḥ
